general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and departments at Sharda University, including its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences, alongside administrative and academic functions like examination reports, academic credit banking, and curriculum feedback. It also details university resources and initiatives such as student support services, skill enhancement programs, entrepreneurship and innovation efforts, media outreach through FM radio, a mentoring portal, and information on university branches in Uzbekistan and Agra. Additionally, it lists key university documents, policies, and important national portals.

career_info.summary: This document outlines information related to SUAT 2025, including sample papers, global knowledge seekers, recruiter information, and opportunities in banking and postal services. It also details career paths such as 3D Assets Developer and Texturing & Lighting Artist, with average annual packages ranging from 3.20 LPA to 6.00 LPA, and encourages individuals to pursue a career in mass communication.
